title: Bernie Meli
text: Bernie Meli (born 22 July 1940) is an Irish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
